data.message: Move to Scotland then you washed up little bitch.Donald Trump will still be president and the national black un employment numbers will continue to fall because unlike the piece of pathetic dog shit YOU voted for,this president is actually trying to help minorities.Seriously dude,get the fuck out and take as many other idiots along with you as you can.
